name: Crocs LiteRide Clogs - Unisex
description: Athletically-inspired clogs for a busy lifestyle. The superbly cushioned chassis offers up world-class comfort. This packable style is perfect for warm-ups and cool-downs.Soft, flexible synthetic Matlite uppers feel broken-in from day one.LiteRide foam insoles are super-soft and resilient.Durable Croslite foam outsoles provide all-day support.
